title: Desktop/laptop ownership among U.S. adults 2008 to 2019
summary: The Desktop/laptop ownership Month in the U.S. adults was Month November_2016 , who made 78 U.S.
The most ownership Month was April_2015 , with just 73 U.S.

In second place was Month January_2018 with 73 U.S. ; third place went to Month February_2019 with 74 U.S. ; fourth place went to Month January_2008 with 74 U.S. and fifth place went to Month April_2016 , who was 74 U.S. .
gold: The statistic shows the penetration rate of desktop and laptop computers among adults in the United States between 2008 and 2019 . As of February 2019 , 74 percent of Americans owned a desktop or laptop computer .
